Headline: #96 Lunt Temporary Westbound Reroute near Lunt/Ashland
ShortDescription: Westbound #96 buses are temporarily rerouted via Morse, Sheridan, Pratt, Ashland, and Lunt, due to construction near Lunt/Ashland.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #96 Lunt buses are temporarily rerouted via Morse, Sheridan, Pratt, Ashland, and Lunt, due to construction near Lunt/Ashland.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #39 Pershing Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Pershing/California
ShortDescription: Eastbound 39 Pershing buses are temporarily rerouted via 39th, Kedzie, 36th, California and 39th: due to, street blockage near Pershing/California.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #39 Pershing buses are temporarily rerouted via 39th, Kedzie, 36th, California and 39th: due to, street blockage near Pershing/California.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #50 Damen Temporary Reroute near Damen/Foster
ShortDescription: 50 Damen buses temp. rerouted NB: Damen, Bryn Mawr and Ashland; SB Clark, Bryn Mawr and Damen: due to, street blockage near Damen/Foster.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Damen/Foster due to street blockage near Damen/Foster.

Northbound buses will operate via Damen, Bryn Mawr and Ashland including the normal route streets.

Southbound buses will operate via Clark, Bryn Mawr and Damen.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier unauthorized person on the tracks at Chicago. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier unauthorized person on the tracks at Chicago.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
